commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
questo è inizio prova è davvero così facile?
sono cosi assetato....
---
wtf!
---
SEEEETEEEEEEE


?> Continua -> Dialogo1
name: Start

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice,)
signal(set,dialogo_prova,ESPRESISONE,)
ciao!
---
da quanto tempo mitico Kevin 
---
il kombini è esploso, sono tutta sporchina ihihi
---
almeno c'erano 7 litri di acqua in bottiglia haha 
sono riuscita a lavare le macchie sulla divisa
?> Continua ->Diag2
name: Dialogo1

commands_raw:
hai sete? prova con la fontana
nel parco anti-tossici

?> Continua -> Diag3
name: Diag2

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
ma cacchio, 7 litri di preziosa acqua....
non mi resta che andare al parco anti-tossici
---
a bere dalla fontana anti-tossici
name: Diag3

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
signal(set,npc_name,Alice)
signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
signal(set,background,bg_bed_room)
signal(set,pg_expression,speack)

Wow... it's so fun playing these games haha
---
The Skirat Games are the best!
---
Alright, after all that nerding,
I'm really thirsty. 
Time to get a drink!

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
    signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
    signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
    signal(set,background,bg_entrance_house)
    -> Fridge_scene
}
name: House_scene_start

commands_raw:
Ugh, what a pain...
---
signal(set,pg_expression,sad)
Oh crap... right 
---
I ran out of water bottles.
---
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)
I need to remember to buy some.

?> Continua{
    signal(set,backgrounds,sink_bg)
    -> sink_scene
}
name: Fridge_scene

commands_raw:
oh well, guess I'll settle for good old tap water.
---
Hey, why isn't it working? 
---
Crap, crap, crap!
---
No, I'm way too THIRSTY
---
I can't hold out.
---
I'll have to do it AGAIN...
?> Continua{
    signal(set,background,bg_bath_room)
    -> Bath_scene
}
name: Sink_scene

commands_raw:
I CAN'T BELIEVE IT!
---
How is this possible? The toilet's dry?!
---
Sigh, guess I'll have to go to the 24-hour konbini.
---
I wonder if Alice still works there.
---
I'm not really the type to leave the house,
but oh well, it's just some water...
---
Nothing can go wrong.
?> Continua{
    signal(set,scenes,res://Levels/Level_city/level_city.tscn)
}
name: Bath_scene

commands_raw:
signal(set,dialogue_name,Alice)
signal(set,npc_name,Alice)
signal(set,npc_expression,speack)
signal(set,background,bg_bed_room)
signal(set,pg_expression,idle)

"Hey, hi Kevin! How’s it going?"

?> Continua{
    signal(set,dialogue_name,Kevin)
    signal(set,npc_expression,idle)
    signal(set,pg_expression,speack)
    
    ->kombini_1
}
name: Konbini_scene_start

commands_raw:
Uhm... 
---
hi Alice. I guess I’m fine... 
---
I just forgot that today was the TOTALLY NORMAL
civil war between East and West...
---
i dont know the motivation for today
---
But uhh... 
---
what happened here?"
name: kombini_1

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Oh, you mean the konbini? Dunno, it exploded. Maybe a gas leak? Who knows, hehe."
name: Diag Node_1

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"Oh, okay... Do you happen to have any water? I’m dying of thirst!"
name: Diag Node_2

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Damn, Kev, I just used the last bottles to wash my uniform. It got dirty during the evacuation—there was this nasty stain, haha."
name: Diag Node_3

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"You mean those empty bottles over there?"
name: Diag Node_4

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Yep! Exactly those!"
name: Diag Node_5

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"....
Alice....."
name: Diag Node_6

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Yeah, Kev?"
name: Diag Node_7

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"That’s like... at least 10 liters!!! Are you telling me you used that holy, incredible, delicious water... just for a stain???"
name: Diag Node_8

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Hey! It was a REALLY stubborn stain! Look, it’s still there!"
name: Diag Node_9

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"THAT'S NOT A STAIN! It's a patch!!! You put it on last month when you tore your uniform! I remember!!!"
name: Diag Node_10

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Ohhh, so THAT’S why it wouldn’t come off! HAHAHA what a fail, LOL!"
name: Diag Node_11

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"My water...
My thirst...
Thirst...
THIRST!"
name: Diag Node_12

commands_raw:
Alice:
"If you're that thirsty, I’ve got the perfect solution for you!"
name: Diag Node_13

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"Yeah? Please tell me! What do I do?"
name: Diag Node_14

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Just go drink from the anti-toxins park fountain, duh!"
name: Diag Node_15

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"But the fountain is on the OTHER SIDE of the city!!!
I’d have to go all the way back, and I really don’t feel like getting hit with more money and potatoes."
name: Diag Node_16

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Silly! Just take the shortcut through the Forest of the Damned!"
name: Diag Node_17

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"Wait, that’s its real name?
Our city is so weird...
But is that forest really a shortcut to the park?"
name: Diag Node_18

commands_raw:
Alice:
"Yeah! Just follow this path and go straight, you’ll pop out right in front of the fountain."
name: Diag Node_19

commands_raw:
Kevin:
"Mmmh, I don’t know... but I have no other choice, I’m way too thirsty.
Oh well, a walk in the woods is easy. Nothing can go wrong."
name: Diag Node_20
